scenario.name: SIP_INVITE_SDP_EXCHANGE_AUDIO_REQUIRED
scenario.send:
INVITE urn:service:sos SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] From: SENDER <sip:SENDER@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: urn:service:sos Call-ID: [call_id] Cseq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:SENDER@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=test_system 1111 2222 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Test System sending SDP with required audio G.711 u-Law and G.711 A-Law c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 8 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
